message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
You're being too generous with Alice, I want more!
You wanted more, now it's your turn to compromise. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet!
I'm not budging much, Bob. This is a fair split considering the inflation.
I'm starting to get impatient, Alice. This is my last warning!
I'm not backing down, Bob. This is my best offer yet.
I'm not going to give you the upper hand, Alice. I'm taking control now!
You're trying to take control, but I'm not letting you have all the power. Meet me in the middle.
I'm not compromising anymore, Alice. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give in to your ultimatum, Bob. I'm making one last offer.
It's now or never, Alice. This is my final offer. Accept it or we both walk away with nothing!
